summary: A suite of asynchronous test modules that verify the real‑time WebSocket subscription capabilities of CCXT Pro exchange implementations, covering balance, order book, trades, tickers, OHLCV, positions and related multi‑symbol streams using shared test utilities.
business_intent: Provide automated validation to ensure that exchanges correctly implement CCXT Pro’s live data streams, helping developers detect bugs, maintain compatibility, and deliver reliable market data to end‑users.
